n  r(n)
13 2.884791881779
14 3.014481257988
15 3.143241301320
16 3.244437877904
17 3.349729261451
18 3.446282750304
19 3.605551275463
20 3.692105318041
21 3.804522530536
22 3.948644563198
23 4.000739711391
24 4.076613423974
25 4.181540550352

For n = 6, 7, 8:
r(3 * n + 1) = hypot(sin(2 * pi / n), 2 + 3 * cos(2 * pi / n))
where hypot(x, y) = sqrt(x * x + y * y).
In particular, r(19) = sqrt(13) and r(25) = sqrt(3) + sqrt(6).
